summary: A teenage babysitter is the focus of two boys and a man's separate obsessions.
cast: Alicia Silverstone|Jeremy London|J.T. Walsh|Lee Garlington|Nicky Katt|Lois Chiles|George Segal|Ryan Slater|Brittany English Stephens|Tuesday Knight|Eric Menyuk|Matthew Kimbrough|Jane Alden|Noel Evangelisti|Michael Chieffo|Hal Fort Atkinson III|Monty Silverstone|Cameron Fuller
title: The Babysitter
